pages.text: And the good land brings out its plants with its Masterâ€™s permission, but the bad land only brings out sparsely. This is how We explain Our signs for thankful people
We have certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said: my people, serve God, you have no god other than Him, indeed I am afraid of the punishment of a great day upon you
The leaders of his people said: indeed we see you are clearly in error
He said: my people, there is no error in me but I am a messenger from the Master of Human kind
I preach you my Master's message and I advise you and I know from God what you do not know
Or are you surprised that a reminder from your Master came to you, by a man from among you, to warn you and so that you control yourselves and you may receive mercy
They denied him, so We saved him and those with him in the Ark and We drowned those who denied Our signs. They were a blind group
And to (people of) Aad (We sent) their brother Hud, he said: my people, serve God, you have no god other than Him, will you not be cautious
The leaders of those who disbelieved among his people said: indeed we see you are a fool and we think you are of the liars
He said: my people, there is no foolishness in me, but I am a messenger from the Master of Human kind
